item.description: We will car pool from Panera & we will depart at 11AM SHARP!!!! SOWA is like an open air bazarin Boston's South End. It changes every week. You will find a wide variety of vendors with wares such as hand-crafted accessories, original art, indie designer clothing or just a loaf of bread. There may be a farmers market. Later if we get hungry they have a wide variety of those fun food trucks. "It's a treat. You can go back on your diet Monday!" You can check it out on their web site www.sowaopenmarket.com. The market is open till 4PM.
item.name: Panera's for a Quick Bite then Off to SOWA Open Air Market
